name: Rubicon 1996
description: ‘Firmly-lodged , pre-eminent Cape statement in claret style for more than 15 years. Generally marked by fine - rather than heavy - cherry tastes, overall refined understatement. Next release ‘96, from a relatively cool year, shows ripe cherries again, some cassis, and spices including cloves. Tannin gravitas has Dalla Cia expecting a 20-year lifespan.’ - Platter’s SA Wine Guide 2000/2001, 4☆ The wines will continue to be cellared at the Meerlust vintage cellar until maturity (estimated 2028) or withdrawal. Rubicon is not produced every year. If a vintage is not produced, the NFT will include the next vintage, to total 50 consecutive vintages
